content.location: Cascade sideThis is uphill from "Orogeny" boulderon top of the hill where the 2 rivers meet at the YLAT/LONG: 41.373838, -82.109390

content.description: The left of the entrance boulder there is a thin iron band threading the rock up meet with Mr Hero. Start on the large hold seated on the far left end nearest the river. Make a move on a crimp then cross to the good rail, figure out how to use the sloping sidefacing holds to reach a good downward rail beneath a large detached block ***DO NOT USE THE BLOCK, DOES NOT LOOK SECURE*** continue traversing right below the block to the good hold near the top of Mr Hero.
content.protection: a few pads to protect the traverse.

content.description: Not hitting the tree and successfully pulling off the mantle.--Start on the high crimps and work to dyno into the large diagonal hold. Reach to the lip and mantle the slab to top. Scary because falling from the mantle would land you on the horizontal tree. Repeated once.Cascade sideThis is uphill from "Orogeny" boulderon top of the hill where the 2 rivers meet at the YLAT/LONG: 41.373838, -82.109390
really great problem with a lot of possibilities for moves.  Depending on how you move you can make this boulder relatively easy or as hard as you want.
content.location: this boulder is on top of the first hill to your right as you start on the trail going towards cascade falls from the parking lot.Cascade sideThis is uphill from "Orogeny" boulderon top of the hill where the 2 rivers meet at the YLAT/LONG: 41.373838, -82.109390
